entry.title: 0.8.6 release candidate 1
entry.summary: On December 5th, 2013, Gavin Andresen sent an email to the Bitcoin-development mailing list requesting help in testing the 0.8.6 release candidate 1, which was available for download from SourceForge. Warren had previously found a tiny error in 0.8.6rc1 where the leveldb subtree merge was done incorrectly, leaving an errant db/ directory in the base of bitcoin instead of src/leveldb. He had suggested a subtree squash and merge syntax in an earlier email on 0.8.6.
